definition: history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China
front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly

sentences.english: Painting originated in prehistoric times with murals drawn on cave walls.
sentences.chinese: 绘画始于史前时期洞穴墙壁上的蹙画。

sentences.english: This is what the Children of the Shadow do to civilizations who use Protoculture.
sentences.chinese: 这就是阴影之子对使用史前文化的文明所做的一切。

sentences.english: The most of crown forms wear by the prehistory jade figures in China are rail crown.
sentences.chinese: 考古所见我国史前玉人的冠式多为纵梁冠。

sentences.english: Stonehenge is perhaps the most astounding construct of pre-history still standing.
sentences.chinese: 巨石阵也许是遗存至今最令人感到神秘的史前建筑。

sentences.english: Hence, there is no official record of "prehistoric" music.
sentences.chinese: 因此，并不存在官方版本的史前音乐。

sentences.english: After all, we seem to have killed off all our prehistoric competitors.
sentences.chinese: 毕竟，我们似乎已经杀死了所有史前的竞争对手。

sentences.english: Stonehenge is one of the world's best preserved pre-historic monuments.
sentences.chinese: 巨石阵是世界上保存最好的史前遗址之一。

sentences.english: The fishery has always been an important prehistoric mode of subsistence in Liaodong Peninsula.
sentences.chinese: 渔业始终是史前时期辽东半岛重要生业之一。

sentences.english: The battle fortress containing the Protoculture matrix is not among them.
sentences.chinese: 装有史前文化矩阵的战斗堡垒不在它们中间。

sentences.english: SINCE time immemorial, farmers have planted their crops according to the seasons.
sentences.chinese: 史前时期，农民便懂得春种秋收。

sentences.english: The altar, as in prehistory, is anywhere you kneel.
sentences.chinese: 如同在史前，你膜拜的地方就是祭堂。

sentences.english: We shall consume all the Protoculture and rise to a higher plane.
sentences.chinese: 我们将消耗所有的史前文化，上升到一个更高的阶段。

sentences.english: The spiritual connections with doll-like figures reach well back into Japan’s prehistory.
sentences.chinese: 玩偶般的人物的精神联系可以追溯到日本的史前史。

sentences.english: Horsetail rushes in prehistoric times grew to immense size.
sentences.chinese: 史前的木贼灯芯草长得很大。

sentences.english: Researchers now believe the prehistoric iceman was murdered.
sentences.chinese: 研究者们现在确认这位史前的冰人是被谋杀的。

definition: ancient hominid species such as Homo erectus, Neanderthal man etc
the Bronze Age/also written 青銅時代|青铜时代[Qing1 tong2 Shi2 dai4]
